entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm over northern sections. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 04 March 2023
